s.text: But by giving absolutely no ground, she gained no sympathy: Everyone thought she was smart, but no one was reminded she was human.
But by giving absolutely no ground, she gained no sympathy: Everyone thought she was smart, but no one was reminded she was human.
Land mines made it onto the world's agenda because Diana put them there, using only the cameras and good will at her disposal.

Even the nontabloid London Sunday Times had the headline "Diana on the Couch"--above a story questioning the princess's mental stability--in the edition that hit British doorsteps (too late to stop) a few hours after her death.
